author: Alexander Smith
title: Trump questions accuracy of China's coronavirus death toll
description: The comments were the latest in a growing series of attacks on Beijing by the president, who has referred to the outbreak as the "China virus."
content: President Donald Trump has heaped further criticism on China over its handling of the coronavirus outbreak, questioning the accuracy of its official death toll and saying he was looking into an unverified theory that the infection originated in a Chinese labo… [+3653 chars]
